title: Shattered Relics League/Tasks/Beginner
content:
Shattered Relics League Tasks/Beginner

All Beginner Tasks[edit | edit source]

Name Task Requirements Comp%
Complete the Gnome Stronghold Agility Course Complete a lap of the Gnome Stronghold Agility Course. 1 Agility 92%
Turn a Log Into a Plank Use a Sawmill to turn a Log into a Plank. 1 Log, 100 83%
Cook a Shrimp Cook a Raw Shrimp. N/A 95%
Burn Some Food Burn any kind of food while trying to cook it. N/A 95%
Use the Range in Lumbridge Castle Use the Range in Lumbridge Castle to cook some food. Cook's assistant 86%
Spin a Ball of Wool Use a Spinning Wheel to spin a Ball of Wool. N/A 86%
Rake a Farming Patch Rake any farming patch N/A 90%
Plant Seeds in an Allotment Patch Plant some seeds in an allotment patch. N/A 77%
Burn Some Normal Logs Burn some Normal Logs. N/A 94%
Catch a Shrimp Catch a Raw Shrimp whilst fishing. N/A 97%
Catch a Herring Catch a Raw Herring whilst fishing. 10 Fishing 88%
Fletch Some Arrow Shafts Fletch some arrow shafts. N/A 89%
Cast Home Teleport Cast the Home Teleport spell. N/A 95%
Mine some Copper Ore Mine some Copper Ore. N/A 90%
Bury Some Bones Bury any kind of Bones. N/A 95%
Visit the Rune Essence Mine Visit the Rune Essence Mine. N/A 84%
Craft an Air Rune Craft an air rune at the Air Altar. 1 Runecraft 74%
Receive a Slayer Task Receive a slayer task from any Slayer Master. N/A 79%
Smelt a Bronze Bar Use a Furnace to smelt a Bronze Bar. N/A 86%
Pickpocket a Citizen Pickpocket a Man or a Woman. N/A 98%
Open 28 Coin Pouches At Once Open 28 Coin Pouches at once. N/A 96%
Steal a Chocolate Slice Steal a chocolate slice from a bakery stall. 5 Thieving 95%
Steal From the Varrock Tea Stall Steal from the Tea Stall in Varrock. 5 Thieving 92%
Chop Some Logs Chop any kind of logs. N/A 95%
Defeat a Goblin Defeat a Goblin. After all, this is not the Goblin League. N/A 94%
Complete Rune Mysteries Complete the Rune Mysteries quest. N/A 87%
Complete Sheep Shearer Complete the Sheep Shearer quest. N/A 77%
Complete Romeo & Juliet Complete the Romeo & Juliet quest N/A 82%
Complete Gertrude's Cat Complete the Gertrude's Cat quest. N/A 81%
Complete the Natural History Quiz Complete the Natural History Quiz in the Varrock Museum. N/A 78%
Complete Monk's Friend Complete the Monk's Friend quest. See quest page 67%
Complete a Beginner Clue Scroll Complete a beginner clue scroll by opening a Reward Casket. N/A 78%
Visit Ferox Enclave Visit Ferox Enclave. N/A 93%
Turn in 1 Library Book Find and turn in a book in the Arceuus Library. N/A 80%
Turn in 10 Library Books Find and turn in 10 books in the Arceuus Library. N/A 77%
Bank at Land's End Open your bank using the bank at Land's End. N/A 75%
Bank at Mount Quidamortem Open your bank using the bank at Mount Quidamortem. N/A 46%
Travel to Molch Island Take one of the boats around Lake Molch to Molch Island. N/A 57%
Open the Leagues Menu Open the Leagues Menu found within the Journal Panel. N/A 100%
Complete the Leagues Tutorial Complete the Leagues Tutorial and begin your adventure. N/A 100%
Achieve Your First Level Up Level up any of your skills for the first time. N/A 98%
Achieve Your First Level 5 Reach level 5 in any skill (not including Agility, Hitpoints and Runecraft). N/A 98%
Achieve Your First Level 10 Reach level 10 in any skill (not including Agility and Hitpoints). N/A 97%
Achieve Your First Level 20 Reach level 20 in any skill. N/A 96%
Reach Combat Level 10 Reach Combat Level 10. N/A 94%
Pet a Stray Dog in Varrock Pet a Stray Dog in Varrock. N/A 91%
Enter Draynor Manor Enter Draynor Manor. N/A 87%
Fill a Crate With Bananas Fill a crate with Bananas for Luthas at Musa Point. N/A 72%
Visit the Tree Gnome Village Visit the Tree Gnome Village. N/A 82%
Visit the Tree Gnome Stronghold Visit the Tree Gnome Stronghold. N/A 92%
Enter the Taverly[sic] Dungeon Enter the Taverly[sic] Dungeon. N/A 80%
Go Through the Al Kharid Gate Go through the Al Kharid gate. 10 Coins or completion of Prince Ali Rescue 92%
Use the Bank in Nardah Use the bank in Nardah. N/A 71%
Cut a Cactus in the Kharidian Desert Cut a Cactus in the Kharidian Desert. A knife or a slash weapon 73%
Enter the Kalphite Lair Enter the Kalphite Lair. N/A 68%
Order a Drink at the Old Nite Order a drink at The Old Nite. 2 Coins 77%
Pick Wheat in Catherby Pick some wheat in the field by the Catherby farming patches. N/A 87%
Buy Something From Trader Crewmembers Buy something from the Trader Crewmembers. N/A 88%
Get Stung By Bees Get stung by bees at the Beehives. N/A 87%
Drink a Poison Chalice Drink a Poison Chalice. N/A 64%
Make some Flour Make some Flour in a windmill. N/A 88%
